summary.para: The MIB_IPMCAST_BOUNDARY_TABLE structure contains a list of a router's scoped IPv4 multicast address boundaries.

remarks.para: This structure does not have a fixed size. Use the SIZEOF_BOUNDARY_TABLE(X) macro to determine the size of this structure. This macro is defined in the Iprtrmib.h header file.
Note that the Iprtrmib.h header file is automatically included in the Iphlpapi.h header file. The Iprtrmib.h header file should never be used directly.

summary.para: The number of structures listed in table[].
An array of structures which collectively define the set of scoped IPv4 multicast address boundaries on a router.
